Name: Chicken Fall
About the game: Follow Us Follow our official community atï¼š Twitter: Bento Duck Games Discord: Bento Duck Games Chicken Fall is a pixelated tactical strategy + horizontal shooting Roguelike game. The game was created by one person with an independent liver. In the game, the player controls the protagonist, Chicken Boss, and defeats a band of various carnivores in the forest with the help of his friends. The overall game style is light-hearted and witty, and thrilling.
